title: List of all Android crypto  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android crypto  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: android-library-crypto
repoList.description: java常用的加解密算法

repoList.name: capillary
repoList.description: Capillary is a library to simplify the sending of end-to-end encrypted push messages from Java-based application servers to Android clients.

repoList.name: Cryptore
repoList.description: Easy-to-use text encryption support library with "Android KeyStore System".

repoList.name: Android-Security-Playground
repoList.description: Example of usage of security-crypto jetpack library

repoList.name: HomomorphicCryptoLib
repoList.description: This project consists of a library to partially homomorphic encryption, developed in Java, with support for Android projects.

repoList.name: CryptoManager
repoList.description: Android Library for encryption and decryption.

repoList.name: tweetnacl-android
repoList.description: TweetNaCl crypto library port to Android

repoList.name: CryptoCoinList
repoList.description: Sample Android application to demonstrate the new Jetpack Compose Library

repoList.name: Android-AES-Crypto
repoList.description: Library for android aes crypto

repoList.name: cryptoMessenger
repoList.description: :lock: A library to add RSA asymmetric encryption to your Android Project
